mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO restaurant (name, zip_code, address, cuisine, x, y, phone_number, homepage_url, updated_at) VALUES
(#{item.name}, #{item.zipCode}, #{item.address}, #{item.cuisine}, #{item.x}, #{item.y}, #{item.phoneNumber}, #{item.homepageUrl}, #{item.updatedAt})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE zip_code = VALUES(zip_code), cuisine = VALUES(cuisine), x = VALUES(x), y = VALUES(y), phone_number = VALUES(phone_number), homepage_url = VALUES(homepage_url) updated_at = VALUES(updated_at)
